HPI 8553 Mitsubishi Lancer Evo III 1996 Rally New Zealand Winner R. Burns/R. Reid



Richard Burns started driving for Mitsubishi in 1996 and contested 4 rounds of the WRC and all rounds of the Asia-Pacific Rally Championship (APRC). The car seen here, N2 APC, was driven by Burns & Robert Reid in the APRC events including Rally New Zealand which was an APRC event that year. Burns was able to take advantage of both Tommi MÃ¤kinen and Possum Bourne crashing out of the rally and take his first major international event win. In a season where no driver won more than 1 event, Burns & Reid took 2nd overall in the championship.
